feed.title: Beer Style Guidelines
feed.subtitle: A site where I write (poorly) about a lot of dumb stuff.

entry.title: Beer Style Guidelines Release Notes Blog

link.title: Beer Style Guidelines Release Notes Blog

entry.content:
This is the first post of the Beer Style Guidelines release notes blog.

Most posts here will be the release notes for each app release. This includes the upcoming v2025.1 release (expected later this month).

There may be the occasional non-release post.

You can subscribe to the RSS feed to stay on top of the updates.

üç∫
